author: wn.com
title: Waterfront transformed into outdoor theater (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) North Bund , the stretch of waterfront north of the Lujiazui area, was transformed into an open-air theater when Verdi's opera ' La Traviata ' was performed there on Sunday. The performance was part of
